description: This policy controls the behavior of moving platform feature on HoloLens 2, that is, whether itâ€™s turned off / on or it can be toggled by a user. It should only be used by customers who intend to use HoloLens 2 in moving environments with low dynamic motion. Please refer to HoloLens 2 Moving Platform Mode for background information.
name: ConfigureMovingPlatform

options.description: Last set user's preference. Initial state is OFF and after that user's preference is persisted across reboots and is used to initialize the system.
options.name: Last set user's preference. Initial state is OFF and after that user's preference is persisted across reboots and is used to initialize the system.
options.displayName: Last set user's preference. Initial state is OFF and after that user's preference is persisted across reboots and is used to initialize the system.

options.description: Moving platform is disabled and cannot be changed by user.
options.name: Moving platform is disabled and cannot be changed by user.
options.displayName: Moving platform is disabled and cannot be changed by user.

options.description: Moving platform is enabled and cannot be changed by user.
options.name: Moving platform is enabled and cannot be changed by user.
options.displayName: Moving platform is enabled and cannot be changed by user.
